column2: "We are ARKS. We travel to all sorts of planets. Some normal roast bird is just too boring!"
"So for this party, I think we should have a roast shoulder from the Malmoth in the Tundra as the main dish!"
"That meat's been getting a perfect score for flavor since ancient times! ...here's the request from the galley!"
"That's why I've got to ask you! Get me Malmoth meat! You've got to supply it for me!"
